# Conflicts Log

Tracked inconsistencies, contradictions, and unresolved issues.

## Structure

Each conflict file contains:
- ID
- Description
- Affected derivations
- Severity (CRITICAL, HIGH, MEDIUM, LOW)
- Status (OPEN, INVESTIGATING, RESOLVED, WONTFIX)
- Resolution notes (if any)

## Naming Convention

`CONFLICT_[ID]_[date].md`
